entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -7.8°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
